faqs.title: Have questions? We're here to help
faqs.subtitle: Frequently asked questions about our treatments

question1.a: Procedures are performed with local anesthesia and are minimally invasive, causing minimal discomfort.

question2.a: It depends on the treatment, but generally patients can resume normal activities in 1-2 weeks.

question3.q: Does my insurance cover these treatments?
question3.a: We work with major insurance providers. Contact your insurance to verify specific coverage.

question4.q: Do I need a medical referral?
question4.a: A referral is not necessary, you can schedule your appointment directly.

question5.q: What should I bring to my first appointment?
question5.a: Bring your previous medical tests, list of current medications, and your ID.
